scripts.dev: concurrently 'npm run dev --prefix app' 'npm run dev --prefix api'
scripts.start: concurrently 'npm run start --prefix app' 'npm run start --prefix api'
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:app
scripts.lint: npm run lint:api && npm run lint:app
scripts.format: npm run format:api && npm run format:app
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:app
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:ci --prefix api && npm run test:app
scripts.install:ci: npm ci --ignore-scripts && npm ci --prefix api && npm ci --prefix app
scripts.postinstall: npm i --prefix app && npm i --prefix api
